bibl.title: Some New Thoughts on Stesichorus' Geryoneis.
bibl.note: 1. The role of Athena. - 2. The presence of Callirhoe. - 3. The attitude of the poet towards his two central heroes. - 4. S 17.8-9. - 5. S 18.10-11. - 6. S 19. - 7. S 21. - 8. S 22. - 9. S 27. - 10. S 85. - 11. 16 (a) PMGF. - 12. Parody of the poem: a. Geryon's appearance (S 87); - b. Heracles' journey in the Sun's cup; - c. [Material for parody].
